text: George Dekle Busbee Sr. (August 7, 1927 â€“ July 16, 2004), was an American politician. He was the 77th Governor of the U.S. state of Georgia from 1975 to 1983. He was a senior partner at King & Spalding thereafter. ==Other websites== * New Georgia Encyclopedia profile of George Busbee * Category:1927 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Governors of Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
